data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Independencia.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Independencia, Dominican Republic

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Independencia who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Independencia, Dominican Republic a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Independencia, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Japanese people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Japanese people.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Independencia, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Independencia, Dominican Republic to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.section_summary:
the state of Independencia, Dominican Republic has a population of 50,800.

We estimate Independencia has 5,506 people who might know Jesus, 42,140 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,153 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Independencia, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

location.name: Independencia
location.cities_list: Duvergé, La Descubierta, Postrer Río, Cristóbal, El Palmar
location.cities_list_w_pop: Duvergé (13,405), La Descubierta (5,521), Postrer Río (3,078), Cristóbal (2,735), El Palmar (2,445)
